item.description:
Singles Party - Bring friends

Come join a party with great people, time to meet people individually, group get together, learn some things about personality types, some optional games offered, great food. Learn about the history of Christmas and how other cultures celebrate Christmas! Come dressed in a Christmas theme (as an option)

$10.
Bring vegetarian entrees, appetizers, snacks or drinks as an option.

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a relationship and personal coach who works with relationship and personality dynamics for individuals, couples and families. The author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, he teaches many workshops on the Enneagram, Myers-Briggs, personal and spiritual development, self esteem and communication and relationship dynamics. He travels to teach in New England and the United States and also does trainings for organizations on team building and the effective use of personality differences.
781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Singles Christmas Eve Party - Learn the History of Christmas
